Text:
Great effort Basil - many thanks.

Look forward to your excellent Le Mans uploads for the rest of the weekend.

Great effort for sure! Thanks again!
(if you can upload F1 or WRC or Moto GP in future it would be great!!)
You should be able to get F1 from thebox.bz as long as it's a BBC broadcast. They don't like Eurosport as it's not UK produced.
